name: TowersVR
description: Towers VR is an artillery simulation game where you play is a cannon operator whose aim is to destroy all enemy operator's towers while being in a destructible tower himself. Each tower is physically simulated so damaging them can have lasting consequences like throwing off your aim or preventing you from firing at all. Features like repairing and building towers in-game as well as online multiplayer, different types of cannons and armour are planned to be in the game at some point.
